Pre-Game Insights: Scotland’s last assignment in the shortest format came at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2024 where they failed to qualify for the Super 8 stage after finishing third in Group B.
Australia will be led by Mitchell Marsh and have called up Cooper Connolly, Aaron Hardie, Xavier Bartlett, and Jake Fraser-McGurk for the series.
The experienced players in Marsh, Travis Head, Tim David, Marcus Stoinis, Josh Inglis, and Adam Zampa form the rest of the squad.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The surface at the Grange Cricket Club is expected to be well-balanced, with seamers getting lateral movement with the new ball.
The temperature in Edinburgh on Wednesday is expected to range between 7 and 14 degrees Celsius, staying pleasant throughout the day.
Others: The series will be a three-match T20I series from September 4 to 7, hosted by Grange Cricket Club in Edinburgh.
Australia and Scotland have faced each other only once in the shortest format, with Australia emerging victorious by five wickets.
